lead_paragraph: Healthy young men were leaving to find work in great waves before the quake. Now, even before the dead are fully counted, it is clear that Nepal cannot afford the losses.

headline.print_headline: Nepal Loses Its Young Men to Migration, Then a Quake
headline.main: Nepal’s Young Men, Lost to Migration, Then a Quake

snippet: Healthy young men were leaving to find work in great waves before the quake. Now, even before the dead are fully counted, it is clear that Nepal cannot afford the losses.
abstract: Nepal's earthquake has further reduced nation's population of healthy young men, who were leaving in high numbers to find work in other countries; economists warn unless government creates incentives to stay, exodus of young men will increase following relief operation, permanently damaging country's capacity to rebuild.
